17#include "ReadBarcode.h"
18#include "DecodeHints.h"
19#include "MultiFormatReader.h"
20#include "GenericLuminanceSource.h"
21#include "GlobalHistogramBinarizer.h"
22#include "HybridBinarizer.h"
23#include "BinaryBitmap.h"
24
25#include "BitMatrix.h"
26#include "BitArray.h"
27
28#include <memory>
29
30namespace ZXing {
31
32class ThresholdBinarizer : public BinaryBitmap
33{
34 const ImageView _buffer;
35 const uint8_t _threshold = 0;
36 mutable std::shared_ptr<const BitMatrix> _cache;
37
38public:
39 ThresholdBinarizer(const ImageView& buffer, uint8_t threshold = 1) : _buffer(buffer), _threshold(threshold) {}
40
41 int width() const override { return _buffer._width; }
42 int height() const override { return _buffer._height; }
43
44 bool getBlackRow(int y, BitArray& row) const override
45 {
46 const int channel = GreenIndex(_buffer._format);
47
48 if (row.size() != width())
49 row = BitArray(width());
50 else
51 row.clearBits();
52
53 for (int x = 0; x < row.size(); ++x)
54 if (_buffer.data(x, y)[channel] <= _threshold)
55 row.set(x);
56
57 return true;
58 }
59
60 std::shared_ptr<const BitMatrix> getBlackMatrix() const override
61 {
62 if (!_cache) {
63 BitMatrix res(width(), height());
64#ifdef ZX_FAST_BIT_STORAGE
65 auto src = _buffer.data(0, 0) + GreenIndex(_buffer._format);
66 for (int y = 0; y < res.height(); ++y)
67 for (auto& dst : res.row(y))
68 dst = *(src += _buffer._pixStride) <= _threshold;
69#else
70 const int channel = GreenIndex(_buffer._format);
71 for (int y = 0; y < res.height(); ++y)
72 for (int x = 0; x < res.width(); ++x)
73 res.set(x, y, _buffer.data(x, y)[channel] <= _threshold);
74#endif
75 _cache = std::make_shared<const BitMatrix>(std::move(res));
76 }
77 return _cache;
78 }
79};
80
81static Result ReadBarcode(GenericLuminanceSource&& source, const DecodeHints& hints)
82{
83 MultiFormatReader reader(hints);
84 auto srcPtr = std::shared_ptr<LuminanceSource>(&source, [](void*) {});
85
86 if (hints.binarizer() == Binarizer::LocalAverage)
87 return reader.read(HybridBinarizer(srcPtr));
88 else
89 return reader.read(GlobalHistogramBinarizer(srcPtr));
90}
91
92Result ReadBarcode(const ImageView& iv, const DecodeHints& hints)
93{
94 switch (hints.binarizer()) {
95 case Binarizer::BoolCast: return MultiFormatReader(hints).read(ThresholdBinarizer(iv, 0));
96 case Binarizer::FixedThreshold: return MultiFormatReader(hints).read(ThresholdBinarizer(iv, 127));
97 default:
98 return ReadBarcode(
99 {
100 iv._width,
101 iv._height,
102 iv._data,
103 iv._rowStride,
104 iv._pixStride,
105 RedIndex(iv._format),
106 GreenIndex(iv._format),
107 BlueIndex(iv._format),
108 },
109 hints);
110 }
111}
112
113Result ReadBarcode(int width, int height, const uint8_t* data, int rowStride, BarcodeFormats formats, bool tryRotate,
114 bool tryHarder)
115{
116 return ReadBarcode({width, height, data, rowStride},
117 DecodeHints().setTryHarder(tryHarder).setTryRotate(tryRotate).setFormats(formats));
118}
119
120Result ReadBarcode(int width, int height, const uint8_t* data, int rowStride, int pixelStride, int rIndex, int gIndex,
121 int bIndex, BarcodeFormats formats, bool tryRotate, bool tryHarder)
122{
123 return ReadBarcode({width, height, data, rowStride, pixelStride, rIndex, gIndex, bIndex},
124 DecodeHints().setTryHarder(tryHarder).setTryRotate(tryRotate).setFormats(formats));
125}
126
127} // ZXing
